\w and|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H5472"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* following \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* inquiring \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H1245"\w*.” The Day of the LORD (Malachi 4:1–6; 1 Thessalonians 5:1–11; 2 Peter 3:8–13)

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w silent|strong="H2013"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w guests|strong="H7121"\w*.
